page.title: 14Trade
page.content: The number of shops found in the area is very small.{Stanford Dingley}boasts a small{Post Office}and an{antique {shop.}The majority of the people go to a nearby{hypermarket}for bulk buying. Local towns include{Reading}and {Newbury.}These are both approximately 10 miles away from Stanford Dingley. There are some small villages which provide the essential goods for this area, which are slightly closer. Many people grow their on vegetables in large gardens but this is only possible in the summer. A private source of transport is therefore a bonus in this kind of area.
